sourcesContent:
import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
import { NativeStackScreenProps } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';
import React from 'react';
import {
    Dimensions,
    Image,
    ScrollView,
    StatusBar,
    StyleSheet,
    Text,
    TouchableOpacity,
    View
} from 'react-native';
import { RootStackParamList } from '../../navigation/types';

type Props = NativeStackScreenProps<RootStackParamList, 'HotelDetail'>;

const { width } = Dimensions.get('window');

// 模拟房型数据 (实际开发中从接口获取)
const ROOM_TYPES = [
    { id: '1', name: '高级大床房', price: 588, tags: ['双早', '大窗'], info: '25-30㎡ | 大床1.8米' },
    { id: '2', name: '豪华双床房', price: 799, tags: ['双早', '欢迎水果'], info: '35㎡ | 双床1.35米' },
    { id: '3', name: '行政套房', price: 1288, tags: ['行政礼遇', '独立客厅'], info: '60㎡ | 特大床2米' },
    { id: '4', name: '标准间(无窗)', price: 399, tags: ['无早'], info: '20㎡ | 双床1.2米' },
];

const HotelDetailScreen = ({ route, navigation }: Props) => {
    const { hotelName = '酒店详情' } = route.params || {};

    // 核心逻辑：价格从低到高排序 (补充要求 2)
    const sortedRooms = [...ROOM_TYPES].sort((a, b) => a.price - b.price);

    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <StatusBar barStyle="dark-content" />

            {/* 1. 顶部导航头 */}
            <View style={styles.navHeader}>
                <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => navigation.goBack()} style={styles.backBtn}>
                    <Ionicons name="chevron-back" size={24} color="#333" />
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <Text style={styles.navTitle} numberOfLines={1}>{hotelName}</Text>
                <View style={{ width: 40 }} />
            </View>

            <ScrollView showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
                {/* 2. 大图 Banner (左右滚动) */}
                <ScrollView horizontal pagingEnabled showsHorizontalScrollIndicator={false} style={styles.banner}>
                    <Image source={{ uri: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?w=800' }} style={styles.bannerImg} />
                    <Image source={{ uri: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1582719508461-905c673771fd?w=800' }} style={styles.bannerImg} />
                    <Image source={{ uri: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520250497591-112f2f40a3f4?w=800' }} style={styles.bannerImg} />
                </ScrollView>

                {/* 3. 酒店基础信息呈现 */}
                <View style={styles.infoCard}>
                    <Text style={styles.hotelTitle}>{hotelName}</Text>
                    <View style={styles.starRow}>
                        <Text style={styles.starText}>五星级</Text>
                        <View style={styles.vLine} />
                        <Text style={styles.facilityText}>2023年装修</Text>
                    </View>

                    <View style={styles.tagRow}>
                        {['免费WiFi', '健身房', '游泳池', '中餐厅'].map(tag => (
                            <View key={tag} style={styles.tag}><Text style={styles.tagText}>{tag}</Text></View>
                        ))}
                    </View>

                    <View style={styles.addressRow}>
                        <Ionicons name="location-outline" size={16} color="#666" />
                        <Text style={styles.addressText} numberOfLines={2}>
                            上海市浦东新区陆家嘴金融贸易区世纪大道8号
                        </Text>
                    </View>
                </View>

                {/* 4. 日历+人间夜Banner */}
                <View style={styles.dateBar}>
                    <View style={styles.dateInfo}>
                        <Text style={styles.dateText}>05月01日 - 05月02日</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.nightInfo}>共1晚</Text>
                    </View>
                    <TouchableOpacity>
                        <Text style={styles.changeDate}>修改日期</Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>

                {/* 5. 酒店当前房型价格列表 (排序后) */}
                <View style={styles.roomSection}>
                    <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>选择房型</Text>
                    {sortedRooms.map((room) => (
                        <View key={room.id} style={styles.roomCard}>
                            <Image source={{ uri: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1631049307264-da0ec9d70304?w=200' }} style={styles.roomImg} />
                            <View style={styles.roomDetail}>
                                <Text style={styles.roomName}>{room.name}</Text>
                                <Text style={styles.roomInfo}>{room.info}</Text>
                                <View style={styles.roomTagRow}>
                                    {room.tags.map(t => <Text key={t} style={styles.roomTag}>{t}</Text>)}
                                </View>
                            </View>
                            <View style={styles.priceSection}>
                                <Text style={styles.priceUnit}>¥<Text style={styles.priceText}>{room.price}</Text></Text>
                                <TouchableOpacity style={styles.bookBtn}>
                                    <Text style={styles.bookText}>预订</Text>
                                </TouchableOpacity>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    ))}
                </View>
            </ScrollView>
        </View>
    );
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: { flex: 1, backgroundColor: '#f8f9fb' },
    // 导航头
    navHeader: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        paddingTop: 50,
        paddingBottom: 15,
        backgroundColor: '#fff',
        paddingHorizontal: 15,
    },
    navTitle: { fontSize: 17, fontWeight: 'bold', flex: 1, textAlign: 'center' },
    backBtn: { width: 40 },
    // Banner
    banner: { height: 250 },
    bannerImg: { width: width, height: 250, resizeMode: 'cover' },
    // 信息卡片
    infoCard: { backgroundColor: '#fff', padding: 15, marginBottom: 10 },
    hotelTitle: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#333', marginBottom: 8 },
    starRow: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 10 },
    starText: { color: '#FF9500', fontWeight: 'bold' },
    vLine: { width: 1, height: 12, backgroundColor: '#ddd', marginHorizontal: 10 },
    facilityText: { color: '#666', fontSize: 13 },
    tagRow: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', marginBottom: 12 },
    tag: { backgroundColor: '#f0f7ff', paddingHorizontal: 8, paddingVertical: 4, borderRadius: 4, marginRight: 8, marginBottom: 6 },
    tagText: { color: '#007AFF', fontSize: 12 },
    addressRow: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'flex-start', paddingTop: 10, borderTopWidth: 0.5, borderTopColor: '#eee' },
    addressText: { color: '#666', fontSize: 14, marginLeft: 4, flex: 1 },
    // 日期条
    dateBar: {
        backgroundColor: '#fff',
        margin: 10,
        padding: 15,
        borderRadius: 8,
        flexDirection: 'row',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        alignItems: 'center',
    },
    dateInfo: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center' },
    dateText: { fontSize: 15, fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#333' },
    nightInfo: { marginLeft: 10, fontSize: 13, color: '#666' },
    changeDate: { color: '#007AFF', fontWeight: '500' },
    // 房型列表
    roomSection: { padding: 10 },
    sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 10, paddingLeft: 5 },
    roomCard: {
        backgroundColor: '#fff',
        borderRadius: 8,
        padding: 12,
        flexDirection: 'row',
        marginBottom: 10,
        alignItems: 'center',
    },
    roomImg: { width: 80, height: 80, borderRadius: 6 },
    roomDetail: { flex: 1, marginLeft: 12 },
    roomName: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#333', marginBottom: 4 },
    roomInfo: { fontSize: 12, color: '#999', marginBottom: 6 },
    roomTagRow: { flexDirection: 'row' },
    roomTag: { color: '#4CAF50', fontSize: 11, marginRight: 8, borderWidth: 0.5, borderColor: '#4CAF50', paddingHorizontal: 4, borderRadius: 2 },
    priceSection: { alignItems: 'flex-end', minWidth: 80 },
    priceUnit: { color: '#FF5A5F', fontSize: 14 },
    priceText: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: 'bold' },
    bookBtn: { backgroundColor: '#007AFF', paddingHorizontal: 15, paddingVertical: 6, borderRadius: 20, marginTop: 5 },
    bookText: { color: '#fff', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: 14 },
});

export default HotelDetailScreen;
